error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to host on port. Is it reachable?
error.missing_credentials: This cluster requires authentication. Please provide a username and password.
error.untrusted_certificate: Elasticsearch's server certificate could not be verified. Either disable TLS verification, or specify a custom CA path below.
error.unsupported_version: Unsupported version of Elasticsearch detected. The minimum supported version is 7.11.0.

user.title: Elasticsearch Cluster Information
user.description: Please provide the URL to access your elasticsearch cluster in the format http(s)://my_elasticsearch_server:port (https://my_elasticsearch:9200).

data.url: URL to access the Elasticsearch Cluster

certificate_issues.title: Untrusted Certificate with SSL/TLS
certificate_issues.description: Elasticsearch's server certificate could not be verified. Either disable TLS verification, or specify a custom CA path below.

data.ssl_ca_path: Fully qualified path to custom certificate authority

authentication_issues.title: Select an Authentication Method
authentication_issues.description: Choose an authentication method to connect to your Elasticsearch cluster.

options.title: Elastic Integration Settings
options.description: Configure the polling and publishing settings for the Elastic integration.

data.publish_frequency: Send events to Elasticsearch at this interval
data.polling_frequency: Gather all entity states at this interval
data.change_detection_enabled: Detect and publish changes to entities
data.change_detection_type: Choose what types of entity changes to listen for and publish
data.tags: Tags to apply to all published events
data.excluded_domains: Domains to exclude from publishing. Defaults to none.
data.excluded_entities: Entities to exclude from publishing. Defaults to none.
data.included_domains: Domains to publish. Defaults to all domains.
data.included_entities: Entities to publish. Defaults to all entities.
data.include_targets: Toggle to only publish the set of targets below
data.exclude_targets: Toggle to exclude publishing the set of targets below

data_description.publish_frequency: Set to zero to disable publishing.
data_description.polling_frequency: Set to zero to only publish entity changes.
